thinking.disposable_income: Hermosa has a median household income of $66,073, with about 38% of households earning less than $50,000 annually. The per capita income of $27,053 suggests moderate disposable income levels, making residents sensitive to transportation costs
thinking.discretionary_consumption: Given the income distribution and average household size of 3.1, many families likely have limited discretionary spending capacity. Higher sales taxes would impact household budgets significantly, especially for the 38% of households earning below $50,000
thinking.accessibility: 87.5% of households own at least one vehicle, with 60.9% driving alone to work and 17.7% using transit. This suggests a car-dependent community but with notable transit usage, indicating need for balanced policy
